paragraphs.text: We’re committed to creating unforgettable patient and family experiences in and around Sweetwater County, Wyoming!

Dr. Feller, Dr. Heaps, Dr. Webster, and our Sweetwater Orthodontics team have delivered spectacular results and stunning smiles to patients of all ages in Rock Springs for over 4 decades. At our practice, orthodontic treatment is about much more than just straight teeth; it’s about beautiful, confident, and healthy smiles.
We can’t wait to get to know you and be a part of your smile journey. Trust our experts and get started with a complimentary consultation today!

items.title: Personalized Care
items.text: Comprehensive, individual treatment plans and a patient-first experience that emphasizes comfort and long-term results.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.text: Latest imaging and treatment tech, including digital scans, clear aligner workflows, TADs and modern braces systems for predictable, comfortable care.

items.title: Experienced Specialists
items.text: Board-trained orthodontists Dr. Feller, Dr. Heaps and Dr. Webster bring decades of combined experience delivering broad, beautiful smiles.

items.title: Fast Starts & Convenience
items.text: Complimentary consultations, same-day starts for braces or aligners when appropriate, plus patient resources and a rewards hub to keep treatment on track.

paragraphs.text: Dr. Feller trained at the University of Louisville School of Dentistry and earned an MS in Oral Biology. He completed his orthodontic residency at Tufts University and is an American Board of Orthodontics diplomate. He focuses on creating broad, beautiful smiles while using the latest techniques to improve comfort and outcomes.

image.alt: Dr. Joseph Feller, orthodontist at Sweetwater Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Dr. Heaps graduated from UCLA School of Dentistry, completed a general dentistry residency at University of Utah Hospital, and finished his orthodontic residency at Montefiore Medical Center where he served as Chief Resident. ABO certified, he brings a kind, personal approach and modern techniques to every patient.

image.alt: Dr. Justin Heaps, orthodontist at Sweetwater Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Dr. Webster earned his DDS magna cum laude from VCU/Medical College of Virginia and completed a Certificate in Orthodontics at Columbia University. He has experience with Ormco Spark clear aligners, TAD placements and a strong history of community service and leadership.

image.alt: Dr. Neal Webster, orthodontist at Sweetwater Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Clear aligners, Damon braces, early evaluations and retention plans — we offer treatment options for kids, teens and adults with convenient consultation and start options.

Doctor holding a model of braces on teeth
Smiling mother and daughter at Sweetwater Orthodontics

og_meta.title: Home - Sweetwater Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Sweetwater Orthodontics in Rock Springs, WY provides clear aligners, Damon braces, pediatric evaluations and retention with complimentary consultations.

image.alt: Team of orthodontic professionals smiling in the Lakeshore Orthodontics office lobby

paragraphs.text: Sweetwater Orthodontics focuses on delivering unforgettable family experiences for every patient during every visit. We do more with orthodontic treatment than just straighten teeth; we help create lasting confidence that shows in everyday life.

Our team builds treatment plans around each person’s needs and lifestyle, using modern technology, comfortable techniques, and flexible scheduling to make care easy and effective for children, teens, and adults.

We offer a range of options, including braces and Invisalign<sup>®</sup>, and emphasize clear communication so every patient understands their plan and feels supported from the first visit through retention.

Dr. Joseph Feller, Orthodontist, brings extensive clinical training and a patient-first approach to Sweetwater Orthodontics. He completed his dental education at the University of Louisville School of Dentistry and earned a Master of Science in Oral Biology for research in molecular biology. He finished his orthodontic residency at Tufts University and passed the American Board of Orthodontics exam to receive his orthodontic specialty certificate.

Dr. Feller pursues continuing education across advanced techniques and appliance systems, with additional training in Invisalign<sup>®</sup>, TMJ dysfunction, and the Damon system to deliver comfortable, modern care.

Dr. Feller earned his dental degree at the University of Louisville and a Master of Science in Oral Biology. He completed orthodontic residency training at Tufts University, where he gained broad clinical and academic experience, including leadership roles during his training.

A Utah native, Dr. Feller values serving local families and helping patients achieve broad, healthy smiles. He stays active in continuing education and enjoys applying the latest techniques to improve comfort and outcomes for every patient.

Dr. Justin Heaps, Orthodontist, combines a warm, personal approach with advanced orthodontic techniques. He earned his dental degree from UCLA School of Dentistry and completed a general dentistry residency at University of Utah Hospital before focusing on orthodontics.

Dr. Heaps completed his orthodontic residency at Montefiore Medical Center in New York, where he served as Chief Resident. He holds an orthodontic specialty certificate and passed the American Board of Orthodontics exam.

Dr. Heaps attended UCLA School of Dentistry as a Dean’s Scholarship recipient and participated in the Dean’s Leadership Institute. He completed further residency training at University of Utah Hospital and finished his orthodontic specialty training at Montefiore Medical Center.

Dr. Heaps values the relationship side of orthodontics and enjoys guiding patients through smile transformations using the latest appliances and digital tools. He is known for creating broad, healthy smiles while keeping care personal and comfortable.

Dr. Neal Webster, Orthodontist, earned his Doctorate in Dental Surgery from VCU/Medical College of Virginia, graduating magna cum laude in 1999. He completed a Certificate in Orthodontics at Columbia University in 2001 and maintains active memberships in professional organizations including the American Association of Orthodontists and the American Dental Association.
Dr. Webster brings experience with clear aligner systems, TAD placement, and advanced mechanics to deliver efficient, predictable treatment plans tailored to each patient.

Dr. Webster completed his DDS at VCU/Medical College of Virginia and received his orthodontic certificate from Columbia University. He has pursued additional training in modern aligner systems and skeletal anchorage techniques.

Dr. Webster is deeply involved in community service, supporting youth programs, local fundraisers, and civic leadership. Outside the practice he enjoys outdoor activities with his family and contributing to regional initiatives that benefit children and families.

slides.alt: Doctor holding model of braces to explain treatment
Dr. Heaps with a smiling teen patient in treatment

paragraphs.text: Sweetwater Orthodontics is committed to giving back to the community. Dr. Webster and the team support youth programs, local fundraisers, and volunteer work including Boy Scouts activities and area youth camps. The practice prioritizes partnerships that improve oral health access and support families across Sweetwater and the surrounding region.

image.alt: Graphic representing community support by the practice

og_meta.title: About Us | Sweetwater Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Meet our team and discover how Sweetwater Orthodontics delivers modern, family-centered orthodontic care in Bountiful, UT.

image.alt: Smiling family welcomed at Lakeshore Orthodontics front desk

paragraphs.text: At your first visit, you’ll receive a comprehensive oral exam with digital imaging and x-rays so our orthodontists can accurately evaluate your smile. You’ll meet an orthodontist and our team, review your medical history, and discuss treatment options tailored to your goals.
We’ll answer your questions, outline an estimated treatment timeline, and review costs and payment options. If you’re ready, we can often start braces or take scans for clear aligners the same day.

image.alt: Father with daughter at reception of dentist's surgery

paragraphs.text: We accept most major insurance plans and will file claims electronically when available to make visits simple and convenient.
Flexible payment options are available. Our treatment coordinator will work with you to find a plan that fits your budget.

Before your appointment, please complete any patient history or consent forms so we can provide safe, personalized care. Completing forms ahead of time helps speed your check-in and gives our team the information we need.

image.alt: Patient filling out orthodontic health history forms online

og_meta.title: Get Started | Sweetwater Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Start your smile journey at Sweetwater Orthodontics. Learn what to expect, access patient resources, and schedule your complimentary consultation today.

image.alt: Smiling patients of all ages at Lakeshore Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Sweetwater Orthodontics offers the Damon Braces System, a self-ligating approach that uses a patented slide mechanism instead of elastic ties. That design reduces friction, can improve oral hygiene during treatment, and often shortens chair time.

image.alt: Two stylish smiling teens taking selfie with braces

paragraphs.text: Metal Damon braces are a durable, efficient option made from stainless steel. They provide reliable results and are often a faster, more comfortable choice compared with older braces designs.

Clear self-ligating braces use ceramic materials that blend with your tooth color while offering the same low-friction benefits as metal Damon braces. They’re a popular choice for patients who want a subtler look.

Clear aligners are a nearly invisible, removable option that use a series of custom trays to move teeth gradually. They make brushing, flossing, and eating easier during treatment and suit many children and adults.

image.alt: Close-up of Invisalign aligners being placed on teeth

paragraphs.text: Spark aligners use TruGEN material and are designed for clarity and strength. They offer precise tooth movement and are an excellent option for patients seeking a discreet tray-based system.
uLab aligners use advanced 3D printing and materials developed by early aligner pioneers. They’re fully customizable to fit each patient’s smile and treatment goals.

image.alt: 3D treatment planning software showing orthodontic simulation

paragraphs.text: Invisalign<sup>®</sup> aligners are a well-known clear aligner option that lets you eat and brush without brackets. Sweetwater Orthodontics offers Invisalign among other aligner brands to suit different treatment needs and lifestyles.

Early or Phase 1 treatment typically begins around age 7. Sweetwater Orthodontics evaluates growth and development early to guide jaw growth, reduce the need for extractions, and make later treatment simpler when possible.

image.alt: Young patient receiving early orthodontic intervention

og_meta.title: Contact Sweetwater Orthodontics | Bountiful Orthodontist
og_meta.description: Contact Sweetwater Orthodontics in Bountiful, UT. Call 307-213-8384 to schedule a consultation or visit us at 1512 Renaissance Towne Dr, Ste 201.

paragraphs.text: Find answers to common questions about scheduling, your first visit, treatment options, payments, and emergencies at Sweetwater Orthodontics.

accordion.header: How do I schedule an appointment?

paragraphs.text: Scheduling is easy — call or text our office at 307-213-8384, or book online at https://sweetwaterortho.com/schedule-appointment/. If you prefer, use the contact form on our Contact page and our team will follow up.

image.alt: Smiling teen patient leaning on wall outdoors

accordion.header: What happens at my first visit?

paragraphs.text: Your first visit includes a comprehensive exam with digital imaging and x-rays. You’ll meet one of our orthodontists, review recommended options, get an estimated timeline, and see payment choices. We can often start treatment or take scans the same day.

image.alt: Patient consultation in a bright office

accordion.header: Braces or clear aligners — which is right for me?

paragraphs.text: We offer traditional braces and clear aligners. Your orthodontist will recommend the best option based on your bite, treatment goals, and lifestyle. Clear aligners are a discreet choice for many patients, while braces may be recommended for more complex movement.

accordion.header: Should I keep seeing my dentist during orthodontic treatment?

paragraphs.text: Yes. Continue regular dental checkups and cleanings every six months while in orthodontic care. We’ll coordinate with your dentist to keep your teeth healthy throughout treatment.
Our Rewards Hub lets patients earn points for good oral hygiene, punctual appointments, and more. Log in to redeem prizes and track progress at https://bountiful-orthodontics.patientrewardshub.com/.

accordion.header: What payment and insurance options are available?

paragraphs.text: We accept most major dental insurance carriers and offer flexible monthly payment plans. Our team will review coverage and financing options during your visit so you have a clear estimate.

accordion.header: What should I do in an orthodontic emergency?

paragraphs.text: For urgent issues like severe pain, loose appliances, or injuries, call 307-213-8384 right away. We’ll advise next steps and schedule an emergency visit if needed.

accordion.header: How do I care for my braces or aligners?

paragraphs.text: Keep appliances clean by brushing after meals and following our care instructions. Wear aligner trays as directed and bring any concerns to your next appointment so we can keep your treatment on track.

image.alt: Girl smiling in the grass close-up
